title: inrum nI varuvAi
sahitya:
(rAgA:  bAgEshrI)   
  inrum nI varuvAi ena ninaindEn edir pArttirundEn enrum inda nilaiyE 
enruNarAdu nAnum senru pOna nigazhvellAm ninaindEn


anupallavi

  ponrinIDu nINDa pAdaiyil naDandOmE inrum enrum 
iNandOm ene tuNindEn tonru tOnriya anbil toDariDa nambiyE
				(rAg  sumanEsharanjani)


caraNam 1    vaLam pOTTum tarum iDai tOnrum nIla vAnam iLam tenralum shUzha 
annALil ninaivinilE uLam kanindEn marumaraiyum varuvOm enrOmE
    caraNam 2  				(rAgA:  hindOLa)  Aa:S G2 M1 D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 M1 G2 S  anda nALum pOnadE andO indirajAlamena tigazhndadellAm
mandiramAi maraindE senradE nondadE manam nIlam bandham 
marandadumE nindaiyEnum sondam senra vidamE peNNE
